segment.text: Section B - Operating Profit and Depreciation
segment.context: Please report non-cumulative (quarterly) figures before exceptional items. Report figures in accordance with UK Generally Accepted Accounting Practice (GAAP) or International Accounting Standards (IAS).

question.text: what was the value of your operating profit before exceptional items?
question.context: Report operating profit or loss figures before tax.

question.text: how much depreciation, amortisation, impairment, and losses on disposals (and/or profits) did you charge in arriving at your answer to question 2?
please provide details of all exceptional items:
context: An exceptional item is an unusually large and uncommon transaction charge that must be disclosed on the balance sheet in accordance with GAAP.
Report income as positive and expenditure as negative.
Please continue on a separate sheet if necessary.

context: For example, explain movements from profit to loss or vice versa and amend figures from the previous quarter with actual figures if estimates were used.
